findings.title: Ownership transfer does not clear delegates
findings.description: Transferring ownership leaves the list of mint delegates and burn delegates intact, which may lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Large delegates arrays could allow denial-of-service
findings.description: Operations involving delegates have linear complexity with respect to the number of delegates, which could lead to denial-of-service. This risk is mitigated by the fact that only the owner can grow the array.

findings.title: Update compiler version and base contracts
findings.description: The contracts were compiled with Solidity 0.4.19 and use older versions of OpenZeppelin base contracts.
